author: Chris Adarna
comment: Wish I could customize the color since I paid

author: Grahame Sutherland
comment: Would be nice if you could change the backlight colour.

author: Kevin Affleck
comment: Great look but in the black and white face drawing mode for the Sony SmartWatch 3 the seconds for not appear. However, in default the appear?  Can this be resolved?
title: Great but not 100%

author: Paul Alviz
comment: Can you make an option for the colours to be inverted in ambient mode? Would work well for sony smartwatch 3. Thanks

author: Keith Freeman
comment: Looks great on my Sony Smart Watch 3!!!
title: Love it

author: Kevin Groves
comment: Awesome. Tried lots of watch faces for my Sony smartwatch 3 and this fills the full screen and looks really cool and visible
title: Sony smartwatch 3

author: Christian Ortiz
comment: Great watch face!

author: Kevin Raymundo
comment: Everything looks good!!! except you need few more tweaks.Like on the (black-and-white mode there is no seconds and when it's starts on the dimmed mode from the screen off mode) Im disappointed cause I paid for this and things are still missing....PLEASE FIX ASAP!!
title: (Samsung Gear Live)

author: Lester Velasco
comment: The watch face design looks sick, but has anyone got it working with Gear 2?
title: Not working with Gear 2

author: Indrapal Sharma
comment: Good
title: Indrapal

author: Clayton Scott
comment: I'm really diggin' the overall look. I dislike that it starts in dimmed mode for a split second when it wakes up from screen off(shows no secs and white connected icon). Please change the clock font to match the rest of theme. Also, the light/illuminator text is peach I would prefer it reddish(or customizable), unless you are emulating some existing watch design. Fix delay on screen mode for 5 stars.
title: Very Cool.

author: Victor Miranda
comment: Hi I just got this for my gear live and wake up mode works. It goes from dim white to wake up straight to orange watchface.  Can you do same fix for the motor 360 same A6. I love this face but I am not using on my moto 360 because it sleeps or disable screen on but still first turn the watch on black and white mode and then regular orange mode. It is so annoying. I have bought 3 of your moto 360 faces and do same. Please fix.
title: Excellent watchface

author: David Shayani
comment: Sweeeet

author: hilliard narvacan
comment: Great watch face just the cards are to big and xovers the time hope to see improvements

author: Daniel Nguyen
comment: After the update amazing watch face had to rated 5 star
title: Daniel N.

author: Colin Smith
comment: Nice watch face with large time and date indicators.  Even better now that it has MM/DD option for date!  Nice to have a developer that listens to suggestions.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
I've added US format option to the app.Please check the updates.
Thank you.

title: Awesome and improved!

author: Leonta Rone
comment: Finally added 12hr format! 👍👍

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content: 12 hours mode added.Would you please check the latest version.Tap the watchface icon on your phone and you can setup.

title: Love it

author: Warren Ezra
comment: This is an excellent watch face.  But it needs a 12 hour mode for a 5 star rating.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content: 12 hours mode added.Would you please check the latest version.Tap the watchface icon on your phone and you can setup.

title: Great Watch Face... but

author: Jake Odom
comment: Edit: great work! Can you adapt it for round devices?

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content: 12 hours mode added.Would you please check the latest version.

title: Almost perfect

comment: The day text doesn't update unless you change the face to something else then back.. Fixing this will make it 5 star

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content: I've fixed what you mentioned,would you please check the latest version.

title: Very disappointed

author: Martin Stepo
comment: The face looks very nice and it has got great potential, however when a notification displays or a Google Now card shows seconds can't be seen. Will rate 5 stars if you can fix that. Battery indicator would be a treat too. Thanks!
title: Good looking, 1 issue though

author: Jerome Donovan
comment: Cant see the time, Google Now card covers nearly half the screen when active
title: Cant see time

comment: Never showed up in my available watch faces list..?
